meanings.sent1: After falling, the sun will rerise in the morning.
meanings.sent2: The balloon rerises into the sky after being released.
meanings.sent3: The toast decided to rerise from the toaster on its own!
meanings.sent4: Like a phoenix, she rerises from the ashes of her past mistakes.
meanings.sent5: The tide will rerise, bringing the boats back to shore.

meanings.definition: To increase in value or amount again.
meanings.sent1: With hard work, the stock prices rerise steadily.
meanings.sent2: The demand for the product rerises during the holiday season.
meanings.sent3: The cookie jar magically rerises with freshly baked cookies every night.
meanings.sent4: Her spirits rerise like a balloon floating higher and higher.
meanings.sent5: The excitement in the room rerises as the concert begins.
